history.proof: intros h st t n pli plt es ci st' ps H. unfold handleAppendEntries in H. destruct (t <? currentTerm st) eqn:Heq. - inv H. unfold nextIndex_preserved. intros H'. inversion H'. hauto l: on depth: 3. - hfcrush depth: 3.

original: intros h st t n pli plt es ci st' ps H. unfold handleAppendEntries in H. destruct (t <? currentTerm st) eqn:Heq. - inv H. unfold nextIndex_preserved. intros H'. inversion H'. - destruct (pli =? 0) eqn:Heq1. + destruct (haveNewEntries st es) eqn:Heq2. * inv H. apply nextIndex_preserved. * inv H. apply nextIndex_preserved. + destruct (haveNewEntries st es) eqn:Heq2. * inv H. apply nextIndex_preserved. * inv H. apply nextIndex_preserved.
